SELECT rc.*, r.size as resources_size, r.name as resources_name, r.md5 as resources_md5, r.create_time as resources_time FROM t_root_config rc LEFT JOIN t_resources r ON r.id = rc.resources_id
ORDER BY rc.${sortName} ${sortDir}

SELECT rm.*, mb.name AS brand_name, mm.name AS model_name, mv.name AS version_name, mbv.name AS base_version_name FROM t_root_model rm LEFT JOIN t_mobile_brand mb ON mb.id = rm.brand_id LEFT JOIN t_mobile_model mm ON mm.id = rm.model_id LEFT JOIN t_mobile_version mv ON mv.id = rm.version_id LEFT JOIN t_mobile_base_version mbv ON mbv.id = rm.base_version_id WHERE root_id = #{id}
ORDER BY rm.${sortName} ${sortDir}
